SEARCH
Package edu.monash.fit2099bootcamp.actioncapables

Class User

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099bootcamp.actioncapables.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionCapable
public class User extends Object implements ActionCapable
A class that represents a User, implementing ActionCapable interface. The user can perform actions and has magic points and dark magic points. The user can also borrow books from the library, and has a set of capabilities.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Aaron Lam Kong Yew

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete()
      Determines whether the User wants to leave the library.
      Returns:
      True if the User wants to leave the library, False otherwise

    • setComplete

      public void setComplete(boolean complete)
      Sets the User's completion status. If the User wants to leave the library, the completion status is set to True.
      Parameters:
      complete - the completion status of the User

    • allowableActions

      public List<Action> allowableActions()
      Adds all possible actions that can be performed by the User. In this case, the only allowable action is ExitAction.
      Specified by:
      allowableActions in interface ActionCapable
      Returns:
      a list of allowable actions for the User
